name: $estimateCost
description: Estimates the token cost for a list of actions

name: $reserveTokens
description: Reserves tokens from buckets for rate limiting

name: $refundTokens
description: Refunds tokens to buckets after operation completion

name: $getBucketInfo
description: Gets information about a rate limiting bucket

name: $addToQueue
description: Adds a job to the rate limiting queue
